name: Gravity Gobbler
description:
Gravity Gobbler is an otherworldly physics puzzle platformer, Use the mind bending gravity to your advantage, orbiting, bouncing and rolling to out maneuver your mechanical foes.

In a reverse orf the usual alien narrative, you play the alien! A small cute lizard like alien, fighting to defend the vibrant living troposphere of your planet from the relentless army of robots who threaten to destroy all that you know! To save your habitat you may yourself become the vent skulking, spaceship destroying alien of human nightmares.

There are 3 main zones in the game, each has a different aesthetic, and each level presents its own unique physics centred challenges, which you will have to master to survive and achieve your goal.
